title: Only vibrates once efter upgrade to android 11
content:
After upgrading to android 11 my phone only vibrates one short time when my clock alarm goes off when the screen is off. My alarm is set to silent and only vibration on. I can see the alarm is still active, it just doesn't vibrate.

The same is true when my phone is in vibrate mode and someone calls me. It only vibrates once.

If the screen is on the vibration works as it should.

I have both overslept and missed several calls because of this.

Any ideas on how to fix it?
